landing.title: ደብተርLink – Biiroo Barnootaa Ogeessa
landing.subtitle: Ecosystem hojii mana barnootaa multi-school, multi-role, ogeessa kan Ethiopiaaf ta'e
landing.featuresTitle: Wanti Hunduu Mana Barnootaa Har'a Jiru Hojjachuuf Barbaachisu
landing.featuresSubtitle: Fe'ichiileen guutuu kan gosa ta'insiin mana barnootaa Ethiopian irratti hojjetaman

smartAttendance.title: Argama Ogeessa
smartAttendance.description: Ilaalchisa argama yeroo dhugaa kan beeksisa hundaawaa haadhaa fi haadha abbaa qabachuudhaan kan filataman qajeelcha argama mana irratti hin jiru.

assignmentManagement.title: Bulchiinsa Hojii
assignmentManagement.description: Hojiiwwan baafadhuu, kennuu, fi qooduu, kan yaadachiisa hundaawaa fi ilaalchisa guyyaa yeroo hin dhore.

parentTeacherHub.title: Biiroo Haadhaa fi Barsiisaa
parentTeacherHub.description: Safuu ergaa bilisaa kan qooda faayilii, ragaa dubbachuu, fi beeksisa push qaban.

gradeAnalytics.title: Xiyyeeffannoo Qoodannoo
gradeAnalytics.description: Bulchiinsa qoodannoo guutuu kan chaartoota milkaa'inaa fi kaardota raapooritii baasuu danda'an qaban.

aiPredictions.title: Ragaa AI
aiPredictions.description: Algoritmoota barannoo mashiniin barattoota balaan jiran hubatanii tarsiimoo tarsiimoo ni gorsu.

behaviorTracking.title: Ilaalchisa Amalaa
behaviorTracking.description: Amala barataa ilaaluu, amala tole kan hammatuu, fi haadhaa fi haadha abbaa achittiin beeksisu.

appealSystem.title: Sagantaa Gargaarsaa
appealSystem.description: Karaa hojii gargaarsaaf kan saggeeffame kan guddisuu, ilaalchisa yeroo, fi furmaata qaban.

resourceLibrary.title: Kutaa Qabeenyaa
resourceLibrary.description: Teessoo dijitaalaan kan yaadannoo, examiilee darban, viidiyoota, fi meeshaalee barsiisuu qaban.

dualCalendar.title: Haala Guyyaa Lammaffaa
dualCalendar.description: Deeggarsa haala guyyaa Ethiopian fi Gregorian kan bulchiinsa hojii qaban.

multiSchoolSupport.title: Deeggarsa Mana Barnootaa Hedduu
multiSchoolSupport.description: Ijaarsa walitti qabdee hedduu kan mana barnootaa hedduu mana barnootaa hedduu hojjachisuu danda'an.

offlineMode.title: Karaa Mana Irraa Hin Jiru
offlineMode.description: Odeeffannoo mana irraa hin jiru galchaa fi yeroo quunnamtii deebi'ame hundaawaan walitti qabsiisuu.

roleBasedAccess.title: Fayyadamuu Karaa Hojii
roleBasedAccess.description: Hayyamaafiilee addaan ba'aa kan bulchiinsa, direektoorota, barsiisotaa, barattootaa, fi haadhaa fi haadha abbaa.
